/*장비 테이블 수정*/ UPDATE KJP_EQPMN SET EQPMN_SE_CODE=#{eqpmnSeCode} /*장비 구분코드*/ ,EQPMN_NM=#{eqpmnNm} /*장비 장비명*/ ,ORGNZT_ID =#{orgnztId} /*소속부서ID*/ ,EQPMN_PIN=#{eqpmnPin} /*식별번호*/ ,UPDT_DT=sysdate /*수정일시/ ,UPDUSR_SN =1 /*수정자 일련번호*/
,BUY_DAY=#{buyDay} /*구매일자*/
,EQPMN_UNIT_PRICE=#{eqpmnUnitPrice} /*단가*/
,EQPMN_MODEL_NAME=#{eqpmnModelName} /*모델명*/
,EQPMN_MAKR=#{eqpmnMakr} /*제조사*/
,EQPMN_CN=#{eqpmnCn} /*비고*/
WHERE EQPMN_SN=#{eqpmnSn}
